description: Overrides default inputs for given field or datatype when generating a semantic form

children.description:
Input instance for override. Should be exactly one component. for-field property will be
provided automatically when semantic-form is generated, all other properties will be preserved.

forDatatype.description: Datatype for input override. Only for-field or for-datatype can be specified.

forField.description: Field for which input have to be overridden. Only for-field or for-datatype can be specified.
